INTEGRITY VERIFICATION

To verify integrity:
  $ sha256sum mana_fhe_benchmark
  Expected: 61a3e1110324297a512da84270f4d73544d96fbdb80dc6bea0dbf94c5a54c5dd

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BUILD INFORMATION
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Compiler:       rustc (nightly)
Build Profile:  release (optimized, stripped)
Build Flags:    -Zlocation-detail=none -C debuginfo=0 -C strip=symbols

Security Measures Applied:
  [x] Symbol table stripped
  [x] Debug information removed
  [x] Source path information removed
  [x] Panic strings sanitized
  [x] Release optimizations enabled

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WHAT THIS BINARY DOES
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This benchmark binary demonstrates the K-Elimination algorithm for exact
RNS division in the context of Fully Homomorphic Encryption operations.

Operations benchmarked:
  - K-Elimination exact division
  - Homomorphic addition (light)
  - Homomorphic multiplication (plaintext)
  - Homomorphic multiplication (ciphertext)
  - Key generation
  - Encryption/Decryption

The binary performs ONLY benchmarking operations. It does not:
  - Access the network
  - Read/write files (except stdout)
  - Execute external commands
  - Require elevated privileges
